ModMetaData.name: Safer Paste Dispenser
ModMetaData.author: denev
ModMetaData.description: Nutrient paste dispenser will preferentially serve non-human meat to non-cannibals.(If there is no other food available, it will serve, even if human meat.) Nutrient paste dispenser will preferentially serve human meat to cannibals. Nutrient paste dispenser will preferentially serve vegetables to zoophilist. Other mood-altering foods, such as raw fungi, are served in the same way.
